judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree of the Orphans’ Court is affirmed on the able opinion of Judge Tener. Costs to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Raymond D. Evans, with. him George W. Keitel, Deputy Attorney General, and James II. Duff, Attorney General, for appellant.
T. F. Ryan, with him Joseph H. Bialas, Tice F. Ryan, Jr., and Bialas & Ryan, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
McGary Estate.
Argued October 1,1946.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Raymond D. Evans, with. him George W. Keitel, Deputy Attorney General, and James II. Duff, Attorney General, for appellant.
T. F. Ryan, with him Joseph H. Bialas, Tice F. Ryan, Jr., and Bialas & Ryan, for appellee.
November 8, 1946:
